{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT300N |revision=v1.0 |fcc_date=04/17/2006 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WRT300N,Q87-WRT300NV1 |ic_id=3839A-WRT300N,3839A-WRT3NV1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4704 |cpu1_cspeed=264 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F320C3BD70 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU281622ETP-J |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (32-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |wi1_module=CyberTAN WE801-B |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (32-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4321 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2055 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325F |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,TomatoUSB,OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_pass=admin |oui=00:18:39,00:18:F8,00:1A:70 |oui_eth=00:18:39,00:18:F8,00:1A:70 |default_ch= }} ''Wireless-N Broadband Router''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT300N}} WRT300N v1.0 serial numbers appear to start with '''CNP0'''. {{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WRT300N_v1.0}} [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linksys_routers Listed on the 'Linksys routers' page on Wikipedia] Probable 00:18:39 OUI for both interfaces, but this could potentially be incorrect (00:18:39 is an OUI on some labels anyway)
